summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: W3LL PEOPLE Multi Stick Universalist 3, 0.4 OZ
Review Date: 2015/12/03
Store: W3LL PEOPLE
Product Description: ['Universalist 3: Peachy Pink Bronze For the woman who wants it all, say hello to The Universalist. This luminous magic stick for eyes, cheeks and lips will take your entire look from drab to fab in seconds with one simple product. The organic based, creamy formula has a satiny smooth, weightless texture - free from all harsh, artificial chemicals and petroleums. So, there s no heavy, greasy film and no creasing. Simply use your fingertip to warm, tap and blend some life-giving color onto the complexion, or use brush. Paraben free. Chemical free. Petroleum free. Fragrance free. Dye free. Integrity rich.']
Average Rating: 4.0
Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Stick, Cream', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Brand': 'W3LL PEOPLE', 'Skin Tone': 'All', 'Material Feature': 'Fragrance Free, Certified Organic, Paraben Free', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '4.3 x 1 x 1 inches; 0.32 Ounces', 'Department': 'Womens', 'UPC': '857900003613 639476759800 781549644633', 'Manufacturer': 'W3LL PEOPLE'}
Review Text: Incredible product! The color is stunning! It went on so smoothly on my lips & was very moisturizing! Nice to know I can also use it on my cheeks and eyes to try out a different look and blend to create the perfect shade. The organic/natural ingredients are also what make this a high end product. I am amazed!
Review Title: Nice to know I can also use it on my ...
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Rituel de Fille - Natural Ash + Ember Eye Soot (Seven Sisters)
Review Date: 2016/01/07
Store: Rituel de Fille
Average Rating: 4.5
Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5 x 2 x 2 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'UPC': '632709440162'}
Review Text: Beautiful eye shadow! Goes on smoothly, easy to apply, without leaving any powder behind- high quality product! Gives a smokey eye look! A beautiful color with a beautiful shimmer- Really brought out the color of my eyes. A lovely product!
Review Title: Beautiful eye shadow
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: AHNESTI - Organic Integriti Replenishing Conditioner
Review Date: 2016/01/07
Store: Ahnesti
Average Rating: 3.6
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Ahnesti', 'Hair Type': 'Dry, Damaged', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '8.0 Ounce', 'Liquid Volume': '8 Fluid Ounces', 'Package Dimensions': '7.8 x 1.8 x 1.8 inches; 10.4 Ounces'}
Review Text: A nice combination to use with Ahnesti Integriti Replenishing Shampoo. Made with organic ingredients (sunflower, coconut & jojoba oils)! Nice, fresh scent. Nice and light on my hair & not too oily.
Review Title: A nice combination to use with Ahnesti Integriti Replenishing Shampoo
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Ere Perez Versatile Vanilla Highlighter Falling Star 100% Natural Chemical-free
Review Date: 2016/01/07
Average Rating: 4.7
Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2.95 x 2.95 x 0.79 inches; 2.24 Ounces', 'Item model number': '129', 'UPC': '763109926342'}
Review Text: Love using this product! Really brightened up my face & made me look more awake! Can use anytime of day to add some glow to your face. Ingredients are all natural. Can be used on cheeks, eyes, lips or on neck.
Review Title: Love using this product
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Graydon Skincare - All Natural All Over Soap + Shampoo (8.0 fl oz / 240 ml)
Review Date: 2016/02/26
Store: Graydon Skincare
Average Rating: 3.4
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Graydon Skincare', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Scent': 'Coconut, Rosemary', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '8 Fl. Oz', 'Package Dimensions': '9 x 2.4 x 2.1 inches; 10.4 Ounces', 'UPC': '632709437346'}
Review Text: Very pleasant scent! I like that this product can either be used as a shampoo or double as soap. All natural ingredients!
Review Title: I like that this product can either be used as a ...
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Graydon Skincare - All Natural All Over Elixir Oil
Review Date: 2016/03/30
Store: Graydon Skincare
Average Rating: 4.1
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Graydon Skincare', 'Scent': 'chamomile,lavender', 'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Unit Count': '5.0 Ounce', 'Skin Type': 'Oily', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '8.7 x 2.3 x 1.4 inches; 7.04 Ounces', 'UPC': '632709437247'}
Review Text: A wonderful, non-greasy oil! It feels great on my skin and has a nice light scent too! A small amount of this oil goes a long way! I highly recommend this product!
Review Title: Great body oil!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

    1. First, identify consistent patterns in ratings and sentiments
    2. Next, observe common themes across product purposes and use cases
    3. Then, note recurring quality preferences and price sensitivity patterns
    4. Finally, synthesize these observations into core preferences

raw_response:
SUMMARY:  
The individual displays a strong preference for organic and natural beauty products, often favoring items that are free from harsh chemicals, parabens, and fragrances. Ratings consistently reflect high sentiments, typically ranging from 4.0 to 5.0, indicating satisfaction with product quality and performance. Common themes among their purchases include multi-use products for versatility, such as those suitable for multiple applications on the face, which suggests a desire for efficiency and simplicity in their routine. 

There is an evident appreciation for products that enhance appearance, emphasize a luminous finish, and provide a moisturizing effect. Quality is clearly a priority, as indicated by high ratings for textures that are smooth and easy to apply without leaving residue. Price sensitivity is less apparent but could suggest a willingness to invest in premium items that meet their quality criteria. 

Overall, this person prefers multifunctional, high-quality, organic beauty products that align with their values of natural ingredients and ethical cosmetics, leading to a simplified and effective beauty regimen.

target_interaction.title: This product felt great on my skin
target_interaction.text: This product felt great on my skin! Finally found an all natural product that can be used to protect my skin from the sun, without leaving an oily, sticky residue or without feeling too thick on my skin. I highly recommend this product & plan to use it all through the warmer months!
target_interaction.title_meta: Graydon Skincare - Natural Elements Sun Cream Complex (1.7 fl oz / 50 ml)
